title: Lambda with Bedrock response streaming
description: Create a Lambda function that invokes a Bedrock model with response streaming.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to write a Lambda function, exposes a function URL, uses the Bedrock InvokeModelWithResponseStreamCommand API, and streams the response back to the API client.

bullets.text: Configuring a Lambda function to stream responses

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
